values:
I have the best husband anyone could ever ask for. He makes my life wonderful and i am so lucky to be able to call him mine. I just love that man so much. So all week we have been looking at cars online because my car was a major POS!!! if any of you have seen my car you would argree. so anyways we were looking. i found a car that i was in love with. i wanted a new baby blue hyundai accent. well i really didnt expect to get one. so Thursday when we were off work we went looking for cars. well the first car lot we pull into there it is. my 2006 baby blue ,its actually called ice blue but you get the idea, hyundai accent. God wanted me to have that car. So andy ,who is great at stretching the truth, talked the salesman down almost 3000 dollars and HE GOT ME THE CAR!!!! yay im so happy. im glad he can talk to people because i could have never talked someone down that much i would have felt bad. but it is adorable and i love it. i have never had a brand new car before. Andy is amazing.

So my little man is growing more everyday. i love watching him do the smallest things like smile. everytime i see him smile at me my heart melts. he is a little angel. he is looking more and more like his daddy everyday. Tanner is starting to make noises now also. ya know other than crying which is a blessing to me. lol. he will just lay there and carry on a conversation with someone or himself, which ever one is listening at the time. just cooing away. it is ADORABLE. me and andy made a beautiful baby boy. Watching tanner learn and grow makes me want another baby. but we will wait awhile for that. for our sanity's sake. lol.

Andy and i are looking for apartments. Finally!!! we are saving money and getting stuff together to get out on our own. we have been waiting for this for a long time. but we had to take care of things first. but we should be moved out by the end of august at the very latest. hopefully sooner but we are working on it.

So there is quite alot going on in my life right now but all good things. For once i am happy. I am blessed with great people that helped me get to this point. i love them all.  ill update again soon!! ~amber~

i'm the girl who will put her head on your shoulder, not because she's sleepy, but because she wants to be closer to you...

i'm the girl who likes to be kissed in the rain, more than inside your bedroom or in an expensive resturant...

i'm the girl who says,"ok, but you owe me..." jokingly not because i actually want something, but because it means i get to spend more time with you...

i'm the girl you can take absolutely anywhere and i will ((or at least try to)) have fun because it means i am spending time with you...

i'm the girl who is incredibly picky, but when i find someone i like i want to spend the whole night curled up in their arms...

i'm the girl who never forgets all sweet little things you do for me...

i'm the girl who actually keeps her body parts in her clothing in public...

i'm the girl who never gives up hope even when i tell others i have...

i'm the girl who once i let you into my heart, there's always a place there with your name on it. & even if we spend time apart, i'm the girl who never forgets you.

i'm the girl who loves to end a hug with a kiss...

i'm the girl who you can talk to you about anything...

i'm the girl who laughs at your jokes...

i'm the girl who will have many inside jokes with you and will remember each one...

i'm the girl who will brag about you to all of my friends...

i'm the girl who will listen to you talk...

i'm the girl who loves it when you hug me for no apparent reason...

i'm the girl who loves it when you hug me from behind or kiss me on the forehead..

i'm the girl who loves you for you, and doesn't care what other people say about us...

i'm the girl who loves it when you introduce me to your friends as your girlfriend...

i'm the girl who loves the feeling when you take me by the hand without saying a word...

so things in my life have taken a turn for the better. i havent updated in the longest time. alot of major things have happened. well andy(my new boyfriend) is wonderful. he treats me so good. i have never imagined that it is possible to love someone like i love him. the crazy thing is he loves me back the same way. its like he always wants me to be happy and he will do whatever it takes to make me that way. im happier than i have ever been in my entire life. His family is great and they are so sweet to me. My parents and sisters absolutely love him. He proposed to me for my birthday. It was so sweet. He did it at his house and in front of his family he asked me to marry him. we were all crying. Obviously i said YES!!! Things are wonderful.
  On other news in my life. For those of you who dont know. im pregnant. Yeah its true. And im happy about it. who would have known that this would be happening to me? im a little over three months. its the weirdest feeling to know that you have a little person growing inside you. but its awesome. i have already had to get an ultrasound but i dont know what im having yet. hearing your baby's heartbeat for the first time is the most amazing and overwhelming feeling you will ever experience. its exciting!
  I miss michael. he went back to school in september and me and kami miss him soooo much! i hope everything is good with him. i love you michael!!!!
  well that is really about it for now. ill try to update more often. And shana if you read this i just want you to know that i love you sweetie and you and your family are in my prayers! ~amber~ 
  New cell number 513-649-1712!

I havent updated in forever. so much has changed. me and nick broke up. it was hard but things are better in my life now then they have ever been. im with a new guy. he is so good to me. nick never treated me this good. he is the best thing i have ever had in my life. its weird how different i am now without nick. but its a good change.

i haven't updated in forever but i just need to vent. i don't know what is going on with my life anymore. my mom is sick and the doctors are trying to figure it out. nicholas is nuts. he is all of a sudden not so happy. we have been together five years. seriously come on if it was that bad we wouldn't have stayed together as long as we have. so we are working on our relationship now. actually i am, i guess i am the problem so i have to fix it. but i love him more than anything so im gonna change.it feels good to get that out. 

on a better note im looking for a new job. im gonna get the hell away from mount pleasant!

You're My Little Pony!! Sweet and innocent and
happy, you make people want to spew burrito
chunks. Even a Care Bear could kick your ass.

I'm just wondering. If you want to say something to someone, why would you make your comments anonymous? If you are afraid to say it to them then KEEP YOUR MOUTH SHUT AND COMMENTS TO YOURSELF. OMG! Sorry i just had to get that out of my system!

On a better note! Two more days of school!!!!! That's it! I'm so so so so happy. I think that leaving this place is what I need the most. I will be so happy to get away from all the drama. Not to say that I haven't created some myself but I will be happy to get away! I will miss some people and those people know who they are but I don't think I will be missing as many as I thought I would. Good Luck to everybody with everything you do!~AMBER~

feel that they have known you their entire
life. Many often open up to you for they view
you as thoughtful and trustworthy. Although
people trust you, you have a hard time trusting
them. You prefer to keep your feelings bottled
up inside, or display them very quietly. It is
alright to open up every once in a while.

I just had the most thrilling experience of my life! My purse had purse sex with Heather's purse. It was AMAZING!!!! The aftermath they were stuck together!! They have yet to part!

So what do we do now? Two more of us are gone! My mind does not process these things very quickly. I'm not sure how much more i can take. It seems like they are leaving us one by one. But I do believe that everything happens for a reason. I just cant seem to find the reason right now nor will i ever. This situation is staring to seem unreal. We will love them and miss them.  I have learned that God works in mysterious ways and may he be with everyone who may grieving.

"Stay"

you say i only hear what i want to.
you say i talk so all the time so.

and i thought what i felt was simple,
and i thought that i don't belong,
and now that i am leaving,
now i know that i did something wrong 'cause i missed you.
yeah, i missed you.

and you say i only hear what i want to:
i don't listen hard,
i don't pay attention to the distance that you're running
or to anyone, anywhere,
i don't understand if you really care,
i'm only hearing negative: no, no, no.

so i turned the radio on, i turned the radio up,
and this woman was singing my song:
the lover's in love, and the other's run away,
the lover is crying 'cause the other won't stay.

some of us hover when we weep for the other who was
dying since the day they were born.
well, this is not that:
i think that i'm throwing, but i'm thrown.

and i thought I'd live forever, but now i'm not so sure.

you try to tell me that i'm clever,
but that won't take me anyhow, or anywhere with you.

you said that i was naive,
and i thought that i was strong.
i thought, "hey, i can leave, i can leave."
but now i know that i was wrong, 'cause i missed you.

you said, "you caught you 'cause you want me and one day you'll let me go."
"you try to give away a keeper, or keep me 'cause you know you're just scared to lose.
and you say, "stay."

you say i only hear what i want to.



I hope things get resolved! You two need each other more than you will ever know! Friendship is one of the most valuable things you will ever have in life! The friendship you two shared was amazing! ~amber~

"Graduation (Friends Forever)"

And so we talked all night about the rest of our lives
Where we're gonna be when we turn 25
I keep thinking times will never change
Keep on thinking things will always be the same
But when we leave this year we won't be coming back
No more hanging out cause we're on a different track
And if you got something that you need to say
You better say it right now cause you don't have another day
Cause we're moving on and we can't slow down
These memories are playing like a film without sound
And I keep thinking of that night in June
I didn't know much of love
But it came too soon
And there was me and you
And then we got real blue
Stay at home talking on the telephone
We'd get so excited, we'd get so scared
Laughing at ourselves thinking life's not fair
And this is how it feels

As we go on
We remember
All the times we
Had together
And as our lives change
Come whatever
We will still be
Friends Forever

So if we get the big jobs
And we make the big money
When we look back now
Will our jokes still be funny?
Will we still remember everything we learned in school?
Still be trying to break every single rule
Will little brainy Bobby be the stockbroker man?
Can Heather find a job that won't interfere with her tan?
I keep, I keep thinking that it's not goodbye
Keep on thinking it's a time to fly
And this is how it feels

As we go on
We remember
All the times we
Had together
And as our lives change
Come whatever
We will still be
Friends Forever

La, la, la, la:
Yeah, yeah, yeah
La, la, la, la:
We will still be friends forever

Will we think about tomorrow like we think about now?
Can we survive it out there?
Can we make it somehow?
I guess I thought that this would never end
And suddenly it's like we're women and men
Will the past be a shadow that will follow us 'round?
Will these memories fade when I leave this town
I keep, I keep thinking that it's not goodbye
Keep on thinking it's a time to fly

As we go on
We remember
All the times we
Had together
And as our lives change
Come whatever
We will still be
Friends Forever

I will miss all of you and i want you all to know that you have made some kind of impression on me forever! ~amber~

Prom is so close. I am personally very excited. This is my first prom! I love my dress and Nick's Tux! i dunno, things are so much better. It feels like i have alot lifted off of me! I was really mean and bitchy for awhile but i feel better. But Seniors have less than thirty days! YIPPEE! I am so ready for summer! 

I have something to say to a certain someone who reads these lj's. You should get over yourself! First lie, you tell your best friend that the guy she likes doesn't like her! Then when she finally gets to be with him, you tell her that he flirts with you! WRONG! He doesn't want you. You need to let her have the chance to be happy instead of trying to take the guys she likes away. You are seriously a horrible friend! and if i were her i would do whatever i could to make you as miserable as you try to make her!

So guys i am having a great day! I am a bit burnt from the tanning bed but other than that i am great great great! ~amber~

So Spring Break is finally here! I will be working the whole time but I'm still happy that we will be out of school! Away from all the drama! And there has been enough lately that I think everyone needs a vacation. I hope everyone has a great break.

Here lately i have been in a horrible mood. I apologize to everyone who I may have been rude to in the past couple weeks. Don't take it personally I just have been really snappy with everyone.

Well nicholas and i are good still. THANK GOD!!!!  I was really worried about us and i think that this is why i have been so grouchy lately. But i love him so much and i am so thankful to have such a great person in my life!

See everyone when we return from break! ~amber~

So I have this big problem. Well its not my problem but it is someone else's. Something has been exposed! So now everything is up in the air. Friends are turning against each other and let me add that these are "best" friends. If you are such a great friend then why try to bring everyone down. When one of your best friends has found someone who they can be comfortable with and feel that they like, why must you try to bring down their happiness. You don't know anything about the way the other person feels. Is it because you are jealous and feel bad about yourself so everyone around you must be as depressed as you are. What kind of friend are you? And about this exposed situation. If you didn't want anyone to know, then maybe you should have kept your mouth shut! Everyone knows now so get over it! This is really starting to get to me. These are my best friends getting affected by your insecurities. Maybe you should sit back and take a look at what your doing  before anything or anyone else gets hurt by you?

I have been thinking alot about life. I mean eventually we will all move on and leave this all behind and truthfully I don't think any of us are 100% ready to face what lies ahead. It seems as if we can't get out of high school fast enough but I will miss all these days that I spend with the people that make me so happy. I will miss those crazy people like Heather. That girl can make me laugh more than anyone else in my life. So I'm not sure if i'm ready for graduation.:(!

 Any ways on a happier note. I think that Nicholas and I are going to make it. There for a while things seemed as if we were getting no where. Four years together and just here recently things seemed to take a turn for the worst. He got in a great habit of lying about everything. And I mean EVERYTHING! So now he is trying to get my trust again. It was very hard to give it to him in the first place so I honestly think it will be even harder to fully trust him again. I no longer worry about the possibility of another girl so that is a step in the right direction.:)

 I have an update on my prom dress. I have found three or four that I really like therefore my mother is taking me to get one next weekend! I am so happy. I was getting really stressed about the whole prom thing but now I can't wait! ACT's again this weekend! Yippee! not really! ~ amber~

Okay so Windsors does not have my dress! I am VERY upset about this! everytime i find a dress i like its not carried in Ohio. So my search for a prom dress is still in effect. If anyone has any store suggestions let me know PLEASE!!!~amber~
There it is people! my prom dress that nicholas is taking me to toledo to purchase! i finally figured out how to put the picture on here.
Sorry it didnt work! it was a pic of my prom dress!

Well today has been okay. No major problems anyway. I think i am coming down with a cold or strep throat. I just feel blah! yesterday we had NHS pictures and they didnt go so well. Everyone was supposed to be there on time so the pictures could be taken at 4:45 and of course that didnt happen. oh well. So today I am going to the doctor to get a shot and then I am going to see my mom! On a good note, I get paid tomorrow! YIPPEE! I love payday.
Last night my dad made plans for us to go to the movies and something next weekend. It was so nice. I can't remember the last time i did something with just my dad. I'm pretty excited! 
I have made a decision that i will learn to play golf this summer. I thought it would me good for me and nicholas! I mean if i learn then we will have something to do that he likes to do. So i think it is a good idea. well thats about it right now.

magical.

I hope everything comes out ok anna! 
Today has been so boring! I cannot wait till this year is over! My little sister is coming over this weekend. This is good cause i haven't visited with her in a while. 
This weather is Great! i love warm weather, it just makes me happy! 
I hate so many girls at Monroe. For the most part they are two faced. But oh well. Hey Michael if you read this, do you know audra's live journal name? Gotta Go to fourth block!

Okay so about the whole friends lying to me thing. Well turns out she told someone i took a pregnancy test for her and thats why it came out neg! I cannot believe this shit! I am so tired of being walked on! when i finally talked to her she said she never said it and that people are twisting the story around! I'm pretty sure theyr'e not. Sometimes people make me sick! So I think that friendship is pretty much over. 
well yesterday was joey's funeral. it was heart breaking! so many people loved him. there where like over a hundred cars driving to the grave yard after the viewing was over. I grew up with him in Mayfield and those days were some of the best days of my life. All of us mayfield kids were there for each other and we always will be. Its just sad that is took such a tragedy to bring us back together. We miss you Joey!

Ok so today has been a pretty good day! I'm excited about valentine's day! I just want to spend time with my baby! he is so good to me! well tonight i work but im off all weekend! YAY! Thats about it for now!
ok so im just wondering what do you do when your best friend lies constantly!!!! i dont know when its a lie or when its the truth. I'm soooooo lost!
Hey This is Amber Martin everybody please add me!!!
